description:
During the summer vacation after all the apparition-related incidents around the five girls have been resolved, Koyomi Araragi`s two risky younger sisters – the self-proclaimed heroes of justice, Karen and Tsukihi – become involved in some trouble. What is Karen facing – it`s not a “monster,” but it`s a “fake”? What is the apparition that surpasses even a vampire that Tsukihi has taken into her body?
Source: crunchyroll
